item.title: Elon Musk's Grok AI image editing limited to paid X users after deepfakes
item.description: It comes after government urged Ofcom to use all its powers – up to and including an effective ban – against X.

item.title: Venezuelan government begins releasing political prisoners
item.description: The US, which recently captured its President Nicolás Maduro, has long demanded the detainees be freed.

item.title: 'He's crazy': BBC speaks to Greenlanders about Trump's threats
item.description: The BBC's Europe Editor Katya Adler visits the Artic island to ask what people think of the US president's plans.

item.title: One dead, dozens trapped after giant landfill collapses in Philippines
item.description: Rescuers have pulled 12 injured sanitation workers from debris at the private landfill in Cebu City.

item.title: Wawrinka handed Australian Open wildcard in final season
item.description: Stan Wawrinka receives an Australian Open wildcard as he begins the final season of his career, but Australian Nick Kyrgios misses out.
